CRBElement_t Struct Reference
[ConfigRomBuilder]

#include <crb.h>

Detailed Description

CRBElement is the node type for all nodes in the binary tree, which represents the ROM.

The root element is a static singleton. Generally, the tree looks like:

root_element->pNext = 0 (always) | ->data.pList->immediate_element->pNext->dir_element->pNext->leaf_element->pNext->immediate_element-> etc... root directory entries | | | | ->data.pLeafData ->data.immVal | ->data.pList->element->pNext-> etc... sub directory entries | ->data.pList->element


Data Fields

uint32 keyId
 the rest of the key upper byte
uint32 keyType
 upper two bits of key = immediate,dir,offset,leaf
uint32 nElements
 track number of Dir items so we can limit to 256
uint32 nodeNum
 count, in order of creation
uint32 * pImage
 addres in ROM this is stored
CRBElement_t * pNext
 next element in the directory
uint32 * pRefFrom
 address in ROM this is refereced from
uint32 immVal
 if immediate entry: lower 3 bytes of entry = value
uint32 * pLeafData
 if leaf: text or raw bytes, formatted/quadlet-aligned for direct copy to ROM
CRBElement_t * pList
 if directory entry: point to first item of content
